T02TD3119E:219a-0: @219a ` // so sor 'brang ma'i sgrub thabs bzhugs /
T02TD3119E:219a-2: # // so sor 'brang ma chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3119E:219a-3: sngar bstan ba'i cho gas stong ba nyid bsgoms pa'i rdzas la /
T02TD3119E:219a-4: aa las skyes pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du yi ge pram ser po 'od zer sna tshogs las sems can gyi don byed pa ste /
T02TD3119E:219a-5: de yongs su gyur pa las skad cig gis bcom ldan 'das ma chen mo so sor 'brang mar bdag nyid bskyed bar bya'o ;
T02TD3119E:219a-6: / mdog ser mo zhal bzhi pa spyan gsum pa /
T02TD3119E:219a-8: zhal dang po ser po dang /
T02TD3119E:219a-12: g-yas kyi phyag rnams kyis ral gri dang /
T02TD3119E:219a-16: g-yon gyi phyag rnams kyis gzhu dang /
T02TD3119E:219a-20: sna tshogs padma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la rol pas bzhugs pa /
T02TD3119E:219a-22: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD3119E:219a-23: gos sna tshogs kyi na bza' bsnams pa /
T02TD3119E:219a-25: rin po che sna tshogs kyi dbu rgyan can /
T02TD3119E:219a-27: sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la /
T02TD3119E:219a-28: aom a'a: h'um dkar po dang /
T02TD3119E:219a-30: sngon po'i yi ge gsum bsam par bya'o //
T02TD3119E:219a-31: de nas nu ma'i dbus su zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge pram bsams nas /
T02TD3119E:219a-32: sna tshogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis bdag nyid mchod par bsam sa te /
T02TD3119E:219a-33: ji srid du ngal bar ma gyur ba de srid du spro bas bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD3119E:219a-34: ngal bar gyur na rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la sngags mu tig gi phreng ba'i tshul du bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD3119E:219b-0: aom na ni dha ri @219b badzra ma h'a pra ti s'a re h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3119E:219b-2: so sor 'brang ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
